com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface ArtifactCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CassandraArtifactCache, DirArtifactCache, MultiArtifactCache, NoopArtifactCache

    public interface ArtifactCache
extends Closeable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CacheResult fetch(RuleKey ruleKey, File output)
      Fetch a cached artifact, keyed by ruleKey, save the artifact to path specified by output, and return true on success.
      boolean isStoreSupported()
      This method must return the same value over the lifetime of this object.
      void store(RuleKey ruleKey, File output)
      Store the artifact at path specified by output to cache, such that it can later be fetched using ruleKey as the lookup key.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        CacheResult fetch(RuleKey ruleKey,
                File output)
        Fetch a cached artifact, keyed by ruleKey, save the artifact to path specified by output, and return true on success.
        Parameters:
        ruleKey - cache fetch key
        output - path to store artifact to
        Returns:
        whether it was a CacheResult.MISS (indicating a failure) or some type of hit.

      • store

        void store(RuleKey ruleKey,
         File output)
        Store the artifact at path specified by output to cache, such that it can later be fetched using ruleKey as the lookup key. If any internal errors occur, fail silently and continue execution.

        This is a noop if isStoreSupported() returns false.

        Parameters:
        ruleKey - cache store key
        output - path to read artifact from

      • isStoreSupported

        boolean isStoreSupported()
        This method must return the same value over the lifetime of this object.
        Returns:
        whether thisArtifactCache supports storing artifacts.
